org.flixel
Class FlxMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.flixel.FlxMonitor

public class FlxMonitor
extends java.lang.Object

FlxMonitor is a simple class that aggregates and averages data. Flixel uses this to display the framerate and profiling data in the developer console. It's nice for keeping track of things that might be changing too fast from frame to frame.

          Creates the monitor array and sets the size.

Constructor Detail

FlxMonitor

public FlxMonitor(int Size,
                  float Default)
Creates the monitor array and sets the size.

Parameters:
Size - The desired size - more entries means a longer window of averaging.
Default - The default value of the entries in the array (0 by default).

Averages the value of all the numbers in the monitor window.

The average value of all the numbers in the monitor window.
